amendment.description: To modify the penalty for nonenforcement of open container requirements.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2276 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2276 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S710-715; text: CR S710) To modify the penalty for nonenforcement of open container requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2276 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
